title: Ratzinger Intro #13 Chap 5 c: Restoring the Original Unity of Thought and Love Heals Philosophy
description:
The self-centered philosophical God, conceived of as Absolute Thought, or even Geometry, gives way in Christianity to a self-revealing, relational God who is Love and Thought. He is Father because His thought is creative love; He is Almighty because His love transcends all power.

Mary Elizabeth Kochan How to pronounce my last name: The "c" is silent just to confuse people.
Bringing Joseph Ratzinger (Benedict XVI) into the converZation in Paul VanderKlay's little corner of the internet.
